name: IMPLANT_OT_3
description: This table contains implant information that changes over time.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the implant record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: PCMKR_PACE_MODE_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on the pacing mode of an implanted pacemaker

columns.name: PCMKR_PV_DELAY_MS
columns.description: P-V delay in milliseconds

columns.name: PCMKR_AV_DELAY_MS
columns.description: A-V delay in milliseconds

columns.name: PCMKR_LV_EARLY_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the left ventricle contraction was early

columns.name: PCMKR_RV_EARLY_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the right ventricle contraction was early

columns.name: PCMKR_VV_DELAY
columns.description: V-V delay in milliseconds

columns.name: PCMKR_VV_DELAY_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on the V-V delay

columns.name: PCMKR_HYST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate if hysteresis is active

columns.name: PCMKR_HYST_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on hysteresis

columns.name: PCMKR_HYST_A_RATE
columns.description: Indicate the atrial rate for hysteresis

columns.name: PCMKR_HYST_RATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the rate-drop for hysteresis

columns.name: PCMKR_HYST_RATE_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on rate-drop hysteresis

columns.name: PCMKR_GEN_PACE_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on pacing parameters

columns.name: PCMKR_RV_SENSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the sensing polarity of the RV lead

columns.name: PCMKR_ATR_SENSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the sensing polarity of the atrial lead

columns.name: PCMKR_LV_SENSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the sensing polarity of the LV lead

columns.name: PCMKR_RV_PACE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the pacing polarity of the RV lead

columns.name: PCMKR_ATR_PACE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the pacing polarity of the atrial lead

columns.name: PCMKR_LV_PACE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the pacing polarity of the LV lead

columns.name: PCMKR_POLARITY_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on lead polarities

columns.name: PCMKR_PR_AMPLITUDE
columns.description: Indicate the amplitude of the P/R wave in millivolts

columns.name: PCMKR_MODE_SWTCH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate if mode switching is active

columns.name: PCMKR_MD_SWTCH_CMT
columns.description: Free text comment on mode switching

columns.name: PCMKR_A_RATE_SWTCH
columns.description: Indicate the atrial rate for mode switching

columns.name: DENT_PLATFRM_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental implant platform size.

columns.name: DENT_DRILL_PROT_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental implant drill protocol.

columns.name: DENT_CONNECT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental implant connection type.

columns.name: DENT_COLLAR_SURF_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental implant collar surface.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_TAPER_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental implant taper.

columns.name: DENT_DIAMETER
columns.description: Dental implant diameter.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_INS_TORQUE
columns.description: Dental implant insertion torque.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_SITE_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Dental implant site.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_SITE_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores record name (.2)

columns.name: DENT_IMP_CODE_PROC_ID
columns.description: Dental implant code.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: Billing provider for completed linked dental procedure.

columns.name: DENT_IMP_AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: Authorizing provider for completed linked dental procedure.
